meanings.definition: To make a sound less voiced.
meanings.sent1: She devoiced her singing to match the style of the song.
meanings.sent2: The teacher devoiced the instructions so the students could focus better.
meanings.sent3: The robot devoiced its commands, causing confusion among the other machines.
meanings.sent4: The wind devoiced the howling of the storm, making it eerily quiet.
meanings.sent5: He devoiced his laughter, trying to stifle his amusement.

meanings.sent3: The devoiced puppet show was both eerie and captivating.
meanings.sent4: The devoiced wind in the night made the trees seem like silent sentinels.
meanings.sent5: The devoiced choir performance was hauntingly beautiful.
